subdisciplines.name: Ceramics
subdisciplines.description: The creation of art objects, such as pottery and dishes, out of earthenware and porcelain.

subdisciplines.name: Metalworking
subdisciplines.description: The creation of art objects, such as jewelry and sculptures, out of metal.

subdisciplines.name: Wood Carving
subdisciplines.description: The creation of art objects, such as sculptures and furniture, out of wood.
